name: Tales of Glacier (VR)
developer: 深圳槟果文化科技有限公司
publisher: 深圳槟果文化科技有限公司
description: It is said that there was a wonder land located in the coldest place of the earth. The indigenous people lived happily under the protect of the God. Until one day, an evil dragon came here leading its vicious corps.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows7 Processor: i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: gtx970 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: windows10 Processor: i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: gtx980 Storage: 4 GB available space
